website_summaries.verdict: Parents looking to save money will be impressed with this versatile, reliable product.
pros: Can be used for a decorative display or as Christmas ornaments
Comes with a hole puncher, ribbons, and an easel
Customers appreciated how easy this kit was to assemble
cons: Prone to mold and air bubbles
Must press firmly to make an impression

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful! But the clay starts drying instantly almost
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful! But the clay starts drying instantly almost, so as soon as kneading is done, hand n feet press should be done asap! I mean asap! If it's a bit over kneaded it starts to get wrinkle on the surface! I bought acrylic metallic gold coating besides the clear coating, and applied few layers to make it look shiny, and it comes out gorgeous! It's a great keepsake
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Made a great ornament. Nice that you can re-roll if the ...
customer_reviews.text: Made a great ornament. Nice that you can re-roll if the handprint got messed up. One warning about the glaze though- if you glaze both sides the last side you glazed will drip to the other side and cause permanent damage because you can't rip off the excess piece of dried glaze without making a hole and damaging the clay. So my advice would be to glaze the front and leave the back unglazed or to glaze the back very very carefully ensuring none drips to the front.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for paw prints!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make ornaments from my dogs footprints! I received the package very fast although it did come a little beat up but everything was fine inside! The directions were simple to follow and also show pictures with each step! I followed the directions exactly and it worked very well! The first try did not turn out well because my dogs were very curious about what I was making them do! I redid the first couple steps and the second time worked out a lot better! I am very pleased with this product! I attached a picture of the final product!
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed. I bought 2 of these kits and one of the clay packets was so dry it just crumbled in my hands. See photo for the dry clay on the counter compared to the moldable clay in my hand. I was able to use the other packet, so I guess this has a ratio of 1:4 are duds. I tried to add water but there was no saving that clay. The odd thing about was it was in a sealed package so maybe I just got an old one? Also, the tiny plastic letters are awful and not user friendly. Anyway, I would not recommend or purchase this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: I can't even say it was missing items because the box does not list the same items listed in the description. It only came with 1 easel and no letters, and everything looks old. Everything listed on the box was in the box though. However there was a sticker on the box with a list of all the things I expected to be in the box. Normally I would return it, but I dont have time to wait for a new shipment because my dog, whose pawprint I wanted, is not doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! They turned out beautifully! I bought 3 them and had enough clay leftover to make a 7th four inch ornament and even a little heart ornament. For all your materials you get it is definitely worth the money! I decided to use black sharpie on the ornaments and then used the glaze that came with the package over it and love the way it looks! I would recommend after you are done forming the ornament and letting it dry for a day to move it on to some type of drawing rack so the bottom can dry. When it comes to our next kid I will definitely be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Leuzinger

customer_reviews.title: Prints came out great!!
customer_reviews.text: We loved the hand and foot prints we made!! Our family loved their gifts even more! I read reviews from a few print kits online and decided to try this one. Glad we did! The clay was easy to use and the glaze was nice. I used two coats. The instructions are easy to follow. It does take two people to actually make the print. One of us held our baby while the other pressed the hand or foot into the clay. We didn't have to press too hard either like some reviews mentioned or other products. Overall, very happy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with some left over
customer_reviews.text: This kit made the sweetest hand prints for my baby. I actually ended up having just enough clay leftover to do both of his fur sister paw prints with his. They were thinner clay but perfectly fine. So sweet. So yes I would buy this again. Also I recommend using the glaze at the end. I was hesitant since I didn’t want them to look shiny and cheap but it’s perfect. Note glaze hasn’t been applied yet in my photo.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Furlong

customer_reviews.title: Best print I have found
customer_reviews.text: It made about 4 prints. It is more detailed than I found. However, they do dry pretty quick so I found it best to do one at a time and keep the remainder of the dough dealed while working on one. It, also, was a bit hard to do the cut out in a neat fashion but we sanded it afterwards for a more perfected look. Over all, it worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, made one extra.
customer_reviews.text: Turns out that it is really hard to get a 3 month old’s hand print. They didn’t look great until the decorations were added and the glaze was put on. Then I was pleasantly surprised. Definitely enough clay to make 3 ornaments which was nice so we could gift 2 and keep 1! Don’t be like me and do them last minute, and then realize you need days to dry them!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: great newborn molds
customer_reviews.text: worked great for making molds of our newborns for prints and hand prints! Even shows the little wrinkles in the skin! I did have to press the newborns foot/hand fairly hard into the clay as my husband held him up and my mom held the other leg/ arm out of the way. (It did not hurt him at all!) Having the eta help was key to getting good impressions in the clay. Also, we used a small bowl to make the circle around the mold as the circle cutter that came with was a little too big.
customer_reviews.author: jacob d. shelley

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Well this was a pain in the @$$. The clay is very dry and difficult to roll out. I hope you’re patient bc I was not the only reason I completed this project is because my mom stepped in and rolled out the dough. I had to buy an actual rolling pin bc the one that comes with it is barely as long as the ornament template. I was excited to do hands and feet of my babe but after the hassle of completing the foot I said forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good
customer_reviews.text: These worked great and dried perfectly so overall I’m happy with them. Two call outs though. Whatever the clay is made of is very tacky/sticky. We got this and one other kit and this one left your hands with this white film. And second they take FOREVER to dry. I think the box says up to 4 days and I don’t think ours were dry until day 8. And we do not live in a humid environment. In fact, with the furnace in the winter it’s probably too dry in our house. Overall very happy with the product just plan for far more days for drying than the box says.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Fail.
customer_reviews.text: We attempted to do this probably 20 times and ultimately failed. I don't know if it is the product or us - we aren't crafty, but still! I also don't know what could be done to fix it, but we had to push really hard to get any kind of print, but whenever we would pull our baby's hand away the movement would smear the print. Just our experience, but a heads up for parents whose projects lean much more toward the "reality" vs the "expectation" end of the spectrum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I usually do these clay hand prints with each of my newborns. No different when we had our fourth baby but I couldn’t find a kit in stores. I found this one on Amazon and it’s perfect. I was worried it would be dried out but it wasn’t at all. Took about 3-4 days for the ornament to completely dry. I would definitely order these again or recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4

customer_reviews.title: Awful clay.
customer_reviews.text: The worst clay! I ordered this kit after a successful creation with another company’s kit. This one the clay was unmanageable and impossible to fix. Could not even make it soft enough for a proper hand print. The clay was dried out so even when adding a little water it had chunks and was never going to make the adorable print that I sought.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Z.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great With Sleeping Babies!
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this kit after using a similar one that required the clay to be baked in the oven, and burning the heck out of it. I used it to cast a print of my nieces hand, and it was super easy (once she was asleep). The clay left a small amount of residue on her hand, but was easily removed with a baby wipe. I followed the directions then let the handprint dry on a piece of waxed paper for several days, and the finished piece is very sturdy -- I'd definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mack Gooding-WaldronTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: So extremely easy too use. The clay was soft and easy too mold. Everything you need to make these comes in the box. The clay, roller, circle cut out, there's letters for imprinting and plenty of them, the finishing glaze made everything nice and shiny. I especially like the fact that besides the two stands provided there were multiple colors of ribbons to choose from if you go the ornament route. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rushlow

customer_reviews.title: Useless doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage, I received a replacement for my original purchase because clay was worthless, it was lumpy even after adding water, it just stuck to hands. Second replacement was also useless. I decided to just throw it in the garbage and didn't even get my money back 😑. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good idea for gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second attempt at a clay imprint. I decided to do my grandson's foot this time. Needed all the clay for this. I would however place clay on parchment or wax paper before cutting as it will stick to your surface and become difficult to remove The glaze really makes it look better. Dried in three days. Stand is too flimsy to use so will have to purchase a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby print keepsake kit
customer_reviews.text: Kit was super easy to use and had everything you need to make great memories and have a keepsake. Product was easy to mold and put baby's hand and foot prints in it. Came with a variety of colored ribbons to customize plus a few options on how you want to finish it. Ornament dried set and dried as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Groce

customer_reviews.title: Third time’s the charm, but these really are charming 💕
customer_reviews.text: These worked so well! While I had to re-do both prints 3 times each (try holding a very squirmy 6-month old baby still enough to press their hand on clay lol), they came out beautifully! I can’t wait to have these as keepsake ornaments to remember how little she was on her first Christmas :)
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Loved the glaze. Did this with my 2 year old grandsons, who were totally non-cooperative. They do not like touching clay or play dough. Their prints were not as distinct as I would have liked, but the glaze (included) helped bring out the hand prints. My daughter in law was very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M. Cimino

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son had made a handprint one in school and my little girl wanted to make one too. We ordered this and set up was easy. We were able to create one for her and even though my son's was made at another time with another brand they look as though they came from the same package. All positive!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These are sooooo heavy! The ones I did with my older child were light weight. There’s no way these can hang on a tree without making the branches sag and I don’t expect them to survive many years without breaking. They also look really sloppy. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Turned out great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with how these turned out! Very simple to use and we got these prints on the first try with our 5 month old baby. I painted the prints silver and it really gave them some depth. After painting I did two layers of the glaze. Even had a little leftover to do a dog print.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It made a great Christmas gift for our daughter who is expecting her first baby after trying for over 10 years. We want her to be able to have memorable keepsakes. The handprint and footprint keepsakes are precious.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kuykendall

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our 1 month old
customer_reviews.text: We got 3 footprints out of the kit. The end product we good and made a perfect gift for grandparents. I followed the directions and didn't run into any issues. The detail in the footprint wasn't super fine, but I did get some lines and details of the foot. Unbeatable for the price. Its worth a try
customer_reviews.author: William J O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Extremly easy and mess free!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great way to capture our sons prints. No mixing or special timing to worry about. Simply cut what you want to use, roll out, get the print, trim it to the shape you want then just let it set till hard. Little to no mess! Took 2/3 days to fully harden. Can out great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexielyn93

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Keepsake!
customer_reviews.text: We've used these kits the past three years now with two babies and our dog. They are great! I've been able to make two big keepsakes of the baby/ toddler hands and one of the dogs paw each year! 🙂 I did add just a little water to it when I was working the clay to make it easier to work with and to keep it from looking cracked when we made the impression.
customer_reviews.author: Pankonin1218

customer_reviews.title: Cute - but 1 out of our 3 kits didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these to make hand and foot ornaments for both grandparents and us. Two kits were great and one was so dried out it didn’t work at all (luckily we had leftover from the two others). Note: It will be hard to do (took both parents 😂) and they won’t come out perfect - but cute enough for a keepsake.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to use and make. I used my own rolling pin, as the one included wasn't heavy enough, but that was no big deal. I made an ornament of my granddaughters hand, and my puppy's paw print. I still have some clay left over.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Quintero

customer_reviews.title: I took a nice imprint of my baby's hand with lots of detail
customer_reviews.text: The order came on time and was as-advertised. It is a thick clay-like material that starts drying out as soon as you open it--making it a bit tricky to work with. I took a nice imprint of my baby's hand with lots of detail, but that's all I can say good about it. It took 4-5 days to dry, is very heavy, and seems like it will shatter when it's dropped. We were only able to roll it out once or twice despite not getting it right because it was already drying. Next time I'll buy the foam kit from Michael's.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought four sets of this to make imprints of my children’s’ hands and feet for ourselves and grandchildren. The clay is easy to work with and the lettering is well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: sm_cunning

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but solid clay imprints
customer_reviews.text: Overall these worked well but I wish I had paid more attention. I had bought something like this before to make an ornament and it dried smooth and was light weight but solid. These however cracked more easily while drying and are quite heavy for use as an ornament. They are very sturdy though and the imprints came out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie E

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t work very well. The clay doesn’t print easily and it’s hard to distinguish the print from the markings and cracks that appear when the clay hardens. Overall a waste of money. Feels like the finished product won’t last very long at alll
customer_reviews.author: D.M.C

customer_reviews.title: Just add water to smooth off any wrinkles, easy and great!!
customer_reviews.text: These were great! Didn’t crack at all and showed the fine lines of my 2 week old and my 2year old as well. The round mold cutout is slightly small for the 2 year olds feet (and she has small feet for her age) but perfect for newborns to 1yr. I got hands and feet molds from both kids!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little kit
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to use and my grandson's little handprint is very cute. Did not use the included form, his hand was too big so we just rolled it out and let it dry.
customer_reviews.author: plantpure

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. Easy and instructions were clear and accurate. Able to make a sweet xmas ornament out of our baby's foot and hand and had some clay left to do our dogs paw print too:)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Worked out pretty well. Simple instructions. Ended up with a few small cracks, nothing major. The hardest part was getting our baby to cooperate, but that has nothing to do with the product. Took about a week to dry, which was longer than indicated, but we weren't in a huge rush.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Zwingli Christensen

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I made two hand prints from one pack of clay. I plan on saving the other package for a later time. This comes with everything you will need! Very, very simple to use! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a Christmas gift for my mother-in-law, and they turned out so well, I want to do another set for myself. Getting my son's handprint took three attempts, but that had nothing to do with the kit and everything to do with working with a two-year-old. I will say, I didn't use the letter stamps or the ribbons.
customer_reviews.author: L. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I was able to get 3 ornaments out of it. Wish they had a bigger size ring though... my son has large hands for a baby and they barely fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this clay because while one package of clay was fine, the other was completely unusable—super dry and crumbly and adding water didn’t help, even after several minutes of kneading. See picture attached. So we got my baby’s handprint but not the footprint :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute ornaments!
customer_reviews.text: I managed to make 5 little ornaments with my baby girl's footprint! The only downside to this product is that it's kind of time consuming. That is, after doing it, you still need to wait 24+ hours for it to dry to then add the glaze...then you still need to let the glaze dry on one side to do the other.
customer_reviews.author: KBishop

customer_reviews.title: Glaze turned yellow 😡
customer_reviews.text: I was debating whether or not to put the glaze on my baby’s print, but eventually decided to thinking that it would preserve the print better. Now I wish I hadn’t because the glaze turned yellow and looks awful!!
customer_reviews.author: alicia00015

customer_reviews.text: Would have given this 5 stars the first time I bought it, but the second time the Clay was already pretty dry when I opened the package. I had to add some water and work it in... which made it much harder to get a smooth surface because it became a bit sticky. So I would highly recommend buying this but it’s hard to say how the clay will be.
customer_reviews.author: MegReg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use following directions, was able to get 5 prints out of these! Made beautiful gifts, the included glaze is so appreciated . However just know it takes a few days to really dry!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: Turned out great!
customer_reviews.text: Turned out great, very happy with the product. The only downfall was that these took a long time to dry, about 3 days before I could glaze them (it’s about 70 degrees in my house). Worth the wait though, very happy with the final product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and creates a great keepsake. Would recommend allowing to dry in a dry area not on counter tops or tile as they make it cold and hold water longer. Overall, drying time took a bit longer than expected but turned out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Beccah

customer_reviews.title: A Priceless Gift at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought another brand that was cheaper but didn’t turn out very well (the hand marks blended in). This one was just as easy but you could see the hand and foot print much more clearly. A great gift for close friends and family as my in laws loved opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I made prints for my newborn niece. I like the thinness of it. And it was easy to follow. But the imprints kind of disappear when you paint on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: MishyP

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product or a variant of it since five years ago. It used to be a package of 3 boxes, but is now only 2. You get more than two circles per package, but overall cost has gone up.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Try Another Brand!!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging said the clay was good until 07/2022 but upon opening the packet it was hard as a rock. As I tried to knead it it turned into crumbles. Tried adding water and kneading for about 15 minutes and gave up. It was wet but just crumpled floating inside. I did a marshmallow clay one for my first born and got the kit at Meijer will be trying another brand. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi L Stachulak

customer_reviews.title: Great tripod!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Durable and flexible. Comes with parts that let you use phone in portrait or landscape directions. Has a clicker to allow you to take pics from across the room. Great tripod. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gena

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Too dry. I tried using a little water to soften but it did not work. I feel like this is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit. Easy to use but did take almost two weeks to completely dry and harden.
customer_reviews.author: PilarPalaBunda

customer_reviews.title: Simple but great memories.
customer_reviews.text: Awwwww, this kit made the cutest little keepsakes for our son’s first Christmas! Very easy to use, minimal mess, and all items needed are included.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: This was a horrible product. The clay was sticky and stuck to ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a horrible product. The clay was sticky and stuck to everything, and they didn't provide a "cookie cutter" to make the circle. Instead they provided a cardboard circle that didn't cut through the edges of the clay. I tried to use a sharp knife to correct it, but the damage was done. We were left with a ruined rough edge circle. Also the "rolling pin" provided was about a 3 inch long stick leaving lines and edge marks all over. It was nearly impossible to get a smooth surface. I tossed it in the trash...go with another product.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Made christmas ornaments for baby's first christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Made great grandparent gifts. These were easy to make, instructions were easy to follow. Value for the product is great, can easily pay 2x this for similar sets elsewhere. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. I got my baby girls foot print at ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I got my baby girls foot print at 3 weeks old. It dried up nicely, and I used the clear coat. Now it is sitting on the display thing it came with on my dresser. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed and upset
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed and upset!!! I used this to make my 3 month old baby's first hand and footprints. We followed the instructions to the letter. After letting it dry for the first 24 hours, I picked up the prints to move it to another area to dry and the underside had black moldy spots!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, turned out great, and had everything needed to make them into ornaments. Took about a week to complete the entire process.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E. Beebe

customer_reviews.title: It does a decent job
customer_reviews.text: The clay does a decent job of creating clay print but it is very hard to get them smooth like shown in the product page.- mine came out ok but wrinkly. The result looks much better after applying glaze finish on.
customer_reviews.author: Denzil Khine

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for our pup, who was dying of cancer. We got it the day we said goodbye. Very easy to use, my 6 year old helped and did most of the work. Just rather have my dog still and not just a footprint in the clay. RIP Rusty
customer_reviews.author: Sean Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Never received
customer_reviews.text: Again... another purchase I overlooked in never having received it! This is what’s bad about ordering online. Shopping and you add things to your order that you really weren’t looking for and then you forget that you ordered them! So dumb!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Old fashion clay
customer_reviews.text: This is the old fashion hard clay and not the putty that is light and dryes fast.It is easy to make and looks nice i just prefer the lighter one as you can make ornaments.this one if deoped would break.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and if I have more kids in the future I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Love books

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: With this product you get more than what you pay for! I was able to make a hand print for my daughter and had left over clay that I made one of my daughter's and son's hand together and used the stand to have it sit on our mantle. I was so impressed with this and you can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Came out great! A couple suggestions
customer_reviews.text: Came out great! A couple suggestions: 1. Don’t use wax paper to dry the molds on. The moisture of the molds causes the paper to wrinkle. The wrinkles caused imprints on the back of the mold. 2. Make sure you really press down on the ring cutter. Pulling the excess clay from the ring mold will cause it to fray. The frays dry and make the mold perimeter jagged. Other than that, the molds came out great! I created imprints of my 5 month old baby’s hand and foot using 1 clay set.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: The clay is not good quality and is dry.
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for me. The clay was too dry. So disappointed. I bought another brand, little hippo, and it worked great. Feeling sad that I wasted money on this. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mahdi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and follow directions
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and follow directions. For infants - this is a two parent job. We made multiple kits for Christmas gifts and memory makers and did our best to have everything ready, one adult held our 6m old, while the other pressed feet and hands into the mold.
customer_reviews.author: e. v. partido

customer_reviews.title: Nice way to spend time with my grandaughter
customer_reviews.text: I loved it to have some fun time with 2 year old grandaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bronisevsky

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Made hand and foot imprints of baby's 1st Christmas. Used them as ornaments for the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands
customer_reviews.text: These were great gifts to make, they are very small, our 2, two years olds hands were almost to big. These made great Christmas gifts , just a bit small for anyone older than a toddler of age 2
customer_reviews.author: K Randles

customer_reviews.title: Harder than you think
customer_reviews.text: The ring in the kit to cut the circle is a joke. Even with a cookie cutter it is hard to cut a clean edge but it can be sanded once it dries. Grandparents will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Joy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice memory item
customer_reviews.text: We got three prints out of the clay and were able to get a hand and footprint for ourselves and an extra handprint to gift.

customer_reviews.title: Easy use no brainer kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a no brainer easy to use kit. It turned out nice
customer_reviews.author: Cyndia Varni

customer_reviews.title: Easy hand print set
customer_reviews.text: We bought this kit for our son’s first Christmas to make an ornament. I love that you don’t have to bake it. We had enough to do his hand, foot and the dog’s paw print!
customer_reviews.author: M. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So great! Easy to do and had plenty of clay. Enough to make baby hand and foot prints, puppy paw and still had extra. Going to be a great keepsake
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very nice made two out of the kit of both my granddaughters hands !!! My daughter in law cried she loved them so much!!! Wonder gifts
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 7

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product-- a must-buy for all parents!
customer_reviews.text: This clay keepsake kit is wonderful! Such an easy-to-use quality product! Can be done in a very short period of time, everything you need is included, and the final product is excellent! Don't hesitate buying this kit!!!
customer_reviews.author: ke123

customer_reviews.title: Dry clay :(
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past and loved it, but when I opened my recent purchase, the clay was very dry and i couldn't use it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JellyBean

customer_reviews.title: Challenging to get a good print of hand or foot
customer_reviews.text: I continue to buy these because if I bought it for one kiddo I need to do it for the next. But they’re extremely difficult to get a good print. I felt like I was completely smashing my infants hand. I do like the feature that you can hang them from the wall though.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Worked out perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, matched description provided. With it being delivered in cold weather, I had to take a couple of extra minutes to kneed the dough out. It was not difficult to use and did not take too much time. I would recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Worked exceptionally well. Very easy to do. Just read directions first. Am ordering second one because these make very nice gifts. Love that everything you need is included in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to do
customer_reviews.text: Easy to do, came out great! I loved doing this with my daughter like my parents did with me. It's such a special way to remember her being a little baby. The clay is premixed so all you need to do it's roll it out.
customer_reviews.author: SasaPDR

customer_reviews.title: Its for Making hand prints
customer_reviews.text: It is what I was what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Bridget G. Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Only got to make one impression. The second clay package was dried out. Such a waste
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I used these to create paw print ornaments for my pups and they worked great. There was enough material to make 2 larger and 1 small ornament.
customer_reviews.author: Jed S

customer_reviews.title: drys way to fast
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. The paint is cheap, ended up using paint I had around the house. The clay dried way to fast, didn't have time to make the print in time. Good thing I splint it into 2 batches.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Bairrington

customer_reviews.title: Sweet chunky baby hands and feet
customer_reviews.text: The perfect keepsake of my precious baby boy’s hand and foot. There was even enough clay left to make a third. The only issue I had was with the letters. It is hard to place them and pick them up without disrupting the surface around the letters.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: BEST AND EASIEST TO USE. GREAT VALUE. GREAT FOR GIFTS. EASY TO USE. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product take a bit longer to dry than instructions indicate but looks excellent.
customer_reviews.author: T Willowmoon

customer_reviews.title: Okay, little too costly for something your making yourself
customer_reviews.text: The cost of something your making yourself was a little much but turned into a great gift, the lettering thing was not very easy to use Bc you have to cut them out to use them individually and it’s a little small!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to knead and roll out. Dried as the instructions said. Loved that it came with the glaze and ribbon.
customer_reviews.author: amkboyd

customer_reviews.title: Lovely keepsake
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful keepsake for my newborn. If you don’t get a print you like you can easily start over. The only problem I had with this product was that it took a week to dry. Oh, & the letters they provide are ridiculously small.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Fun project
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of these. Fun for kids. Could also use for dogs or cats too.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hershberger

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun craft and perfect gift for a loved one.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. I was a little dissapointed that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I was a little dissapointed that the clay cracked around the edges when it dried. But it still worked well and I got a great impression of my newborn's hand and foot!
customer_reviews.author: mra63081

product_meta.title: Proud Baby Deluxe Clay Hand Print & Footprint Keepsake Kit - Glaze Finish - Letter Stamps - 4 Ribbons - 2 EASELS - Dries Stone Hard - No Bake - Air Drying (Makes 2 Plaques)
product_meta.description: Size:Deluxe Kit - SingleDeluxe Clay Hanging Keepsake Kit - Makes 2 Keepsakes This kit includes 2 packages of soft, pliable air-drying clay. The non-toxic clay is safe and easy to use to capture those precious little hands, feet or paws. After you make the impressions, the clay dries into a hard and durable stone-like material in 3-5 days. The keepsake can be displayed as a holiday ornament on a tree, as a wall hanging, or displayed on a table-top easel. Recommended ages: About 0-2 years (if using the 4" rings). Also use for pets. Kit Includes: Two bags of air-drying clay (makes 2 keepsakes of 4" diameter, or 1 larger keepsake), 2 plastic cutting rings of 4" diameter, letter stamps, glaze finish and brush, 2 black plastic easels, wooden rolling pin, plastic straw hole punch, four pieces of satin ribbon in pink, blue, red and green and Easy-to-follow instructions. [How to best dry the clay: It is rare, but the clay can crack if dried too quickly (most likely) and/or unevenly. When the clay cracks while drying, the surface and/or edges have dried much more quickly than the center. To prevent cracking, be sure the clay is rolled out evenly (not thinner on the edges, etc) and is as smooth on the surface as possible before making the print. Keep the clay covered with plastic or a damp cloth while waiting to make the print and for about the first 24 hours of drying, or until the clay surface becomes leathery hard. After that time periods is over, be sure uncover the clay so that it can continue to dry. Never allow the clay to dry in or near a direct heat source such as a heat vent or in direct sunlight. Overall, allow to dry in the coolest area of the home when possible.]
feature_bullets: Included: 2 packs of clay, 2 Cutting Rings, Letter Stamps, Glaze Finish, 2 Black Plastic Easels, Hole Punch, Ribbons in Red, Green, Pink & Light Blue, Written Directions

specifications.Additional product features: Baby handprint kit, first christmas ornament, baby keepsake, baby bundles newbornt, ceramic hand print kit, popular gift, hand molding plaster mold casting footprint ink pad paw print, mothers fathers day hands feet
specifications.Best uses: Baby Handprint Footprint Ornament Keepsake Kit
